title: Portfolio Site (Lab 1)
description: Built my personal portfolio homepage using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript modulesâ€”includes a responsive layout, dark-mode toggle, and site-wide navigation.

title: Dynamic Projects Page (Lab 2)
description: Loaded project data from a local JSON file and rendered it into a grid of cards via a reusable `renderProjects` function.

title: Home Page Latest Projects & GitHub Stats (Lab 3)
description: Fetched the first three projects plus real-time GitHub profile stats from the GitHub API, dynamically inserting both into the homepage.

title: Human Development Indicators Visualization
description: Explored HDI data in Python, then built interactive charts to illustrate trends across countries and years using Matplotlib.

title: Automated Birthday Message Generator
description: Cron job that scrapes Google Calendar for upcoming birthdays and uses Twilio + Claude AI to send personalized SMS greetings.

title: Full-Stack Inventory Tracker
description: MERN-stack web app for managing college book inventories; features user auth, cart functionality, and real-time stock updates.

title: OpenAI + LLaMA Chatbot
description: Integrated OpenAI and LLaMA backends into a web chat interface; added feedback-loop analytics to reduce incorrect replies by 30%.

title: Machine Learning Spam Classifier
description: Trained and evaluated Naive Bayes and SVM models on email datasets to distinguish spam vs. ham with 95% accuracy.

title: Stock Price Predictor
description: Used Python, Pandas, and scikit-learn to build a regression model forecasting daily closing prices of tech stocks.

title: Real-time Chat App (Socket.io)
description: Node.js and Socket.io powered chatroom with support for multiple rooms, user presence indicators, and message history.

title: Personal Blog (Next.js)
description: Developed a static-site blog with Next.js, Markdown support, and dynamic theming; deployed on Vercel for CI/CD.

title: Weather Dashboard (API Integration)
description: Built a responsive web dashboard that fetches and displays local weather data from OpenWeatherMap API.
